briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Dexmedetomidine Added to Modified Pectoral's Block
officialTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Dexmedetomidine Added to Modified Pectoral's Block in Patient Undergoing Breast Cancer Surgery :A Comparative Study
primaryOutcomeMeasure: I.V patient controlled analgesia (PCA) morphine consumption
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* ASA I - II patients

  * weight 50- 100 kg
* age 18-60 years

Exclusion Criteria:

* History of bleeding diathesis
* Relevant drug allergy
* Opioid dependence
* Sepsis
* Those with psychiatric illnesses that would interfere with perception and assessment of pain will be excluded from the study
